body.directions: Listen to the audio, and complete the multiple-choice questions that follow.

body.quiz: Which bold type character in the following words has the same final as the word in the audio?
body.correct: Job wonderfully done! 穿 chuān (to wear (essential items)) has the final “uan,” which is also shared by the character 员 yuán in the word 服务员 fúwùyuán (waiter/waitress).
body.incorrect: Very close. Listen to the word in the audio again, and consider what final it has. You can then sound out the bold type characters in the words in the choices to see which one has the same final.

body.quiz: Which of the following images does not show the word in the audio?
body.answer: Image of a man in a shirt ©iStock
options: Image of engineer in blue workwear uniform ©iStock
Image of medical worker, wearing uniform©iStock
Image of waitress, wearing uniform©iStock
body.correct: Outstanding! 制服 zhìfú means “uniform” in general. Of the images provided, the person in the shirt is not wearing a uniform.
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen to the word again. Identify its meaning, and then look at the images to see which person’s clothing cannot be described by it.

body.quiz: Which of the following sentences can be best completed with the word in the audio?
body.answer: 我很喜欢你的____。Wǒ hěn xǐhuān nǐde____.
options: 她今天早餐吃____。 Tā jīntiān zǎocān chī____.
他星期一庆祝____。 Tā xīngqīyī qìngzhù____.
我姐姐____点去学校。 Wǒjiějie____ diǎn qù xuéxiào.
body.correct: Outstanding job! 鞋 xié means “shoes,” and the one sentence it can fit in is 我很喜欢你的鞋。Wǒ hěn xǐhuān nǐde xié. (I like your shoes very much.)
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen to the audio several more times to identify its meaning, and then fit it in the sentences to see which one makes the most sense to you.

body.quiz: Which of the following seasons do you least need the item in audio?
body.answer: Audio for 夏天 xiàtiān
options: Audio for 春天 chūntiān
Audio for 秋天 qiūtiān
Audio for 冬天 dōngtiān
body.correct: Excellently done! 毛衣 máoyī means “sweater,” which is least needed when it’s warmer, while 夏天 xiàtiān (summer) is the hottest season of the four.
body.incorrect: Listen to the audio again and consider its meaning. Then listen to the choices and consider for which season the item in audio is least needed, temperature-wise.
